property.name: showErrors
property.label: Show errors if there is no geolocation available
property.description: Check this box to show an error toast if the device does not support geolocation.

property.name: showMap
property.label: Show a map with a marker of the current geolocation
property.description: Check this box to show a map with the current geolocation.

property.name: zoomLevel
property.label: Initial zoom level for map
property.description: If a map is shown, this value sets the initial zoom level for the map.

property.name: altitude
property.label: Current altitude
property.description: The device's altitude in meters (may return null on some devices).

property.name: speed
property.label: Current speed
property.description: The device's speed in meters per second (may return null on some devices).

property.name: heading
property.label: Current heading
property.description: The device's heading in degrees (returns null if speed is 0).
